name: Nightmare Despair
description:
You may think your virtual pet  is cute.  Whatever you do not turn your phone off has it could change your life. Fight against your virtual pet has it seals all your data away on your phone.  To uncover your most valuable secrets. Unlock apps on your phone to confront these demons. This could be the end  has they may leak all of your information online.    

Controls 

Tap on the monsters to destroy with mouse.
